data-not-available: No data. Error in block configuration.
error-email-format: Please provide a valid email address
error-loading-actions: {context, select, CASE_STUDY {Error loading the case studies list} STRATEGY {Error loading the strategies list} other {Error loading the actions list}}
error-no-layout: No layout defined. Add some content here.
feedback-description: Did you discover something that does not work? Or do you have ideas on something we can improve?
feedback-error-content: Something went wrong and your feedback was not received. Please try again in a moment.
feedback-prompt: Please let us know by filling and sending this form.
feedback-thankyou-content: Thank you for taking the time to provide us feedback. It's truly helpful.
filter-text: {context, select, STRATEGY {Search strategies} CASE_STUDY {Search case studies} INDICATOR {Search indicators} other {Search actions}}
indicator-related-actions: {context, select, CASE_STUDY {Case studies that impact this indicator} STRATEGY {Strategies that impact this indicator} other {Actions that impact this indicator}}

instance-type-staging-message: This is a staging version of the service
instance-type-testing-message: This is a test version of the service
instance-type-preview-message: This is a preview version of the service
name: Name

other-plans-only: Search only across other cities' plans
percentage-point-explainer: A percentage point is the unit for the arithmetic difference between two percentages.
recently-updated-actions: {context, select, CASE_STUDY {Recently updated case studies} STRATEGY {Recently updated strategies} other {Recently updated actions}}

see-all-results: {count, plural, one {See result} other {See all # results}}
search-no-results: No results for this search. Try changing the search terms.
admin-login-not-defined: Admin login page has not been defined
indicator-progress-bar: On the year {startYear} {name} was {startValue}. Latest observed value in {latestYear} was {latestValue}. The goal for the year {goalYear} is {goalValue}. Since {startYear} reduction is {reduced}. {toBeReduced} still needs to be reduced before the year {goalYear}.
nav-actions-pager: {context, select, CASE_STUDY {Case studies pager} STRATEGY {Strategies pager} other {Actions pager}}
form-action-filters: {context, select, CASE_STUDY {Case studies list filters} STRATEGY {Strategies list filters} other {Actions list filters}}
filter-impact-help: {context, select, CASE_STUDY {Show case studies with selected impact} STRATEGY {Show strategies with selected impact} other {Show actions with selected impact}}
filter-organization-help: {context, select, DIVISION {Show actions that the selected division is responsible for} other {Show actions that the selected organization is responsible for}}
filter-phase-help: {context, select, CASE_STUDY {Show case studies in selected implementation phase} STRATEGY {Show strategies in selected implementation phase} other {Show actions in selected implementation phase}}
filter-plan-help: {context, select CASE_STUDY {Show case studies in selected plan} STRATEGY {Show strategies in selected plan} other {Show actions in selected plan}}
filter-primary-organization-help: {context, select, DIVISION {Show actions of selected division} other {Show actions of selected municipality}}

content-could-not-be-displayed: We're unable to display this content at the moment. Please try refreshing the page. A report has been sent to our team to investigate the issue.
form-effectively-empty-error: Your feedback is empty. Please fill in at least one field.
do-not-show-video-again: Do not show this video again
pledge-no-commitments: You haven't committed to any pledges yet. Browse all pledges to find one that interests you!
pledge-empty-heading: You haven't committed to any pledges yet – let's change that!
pledge-empty-subtext: Here's a pledge to get you started:
pledge-impact-if-residents-commit-html: {count, plural, one {If # resident commits to this pledge} other {If # residents commit to this pledge}}
pledge-how-this-supports-climate-plan: How this supports our climate plan
pledge-commitment-count: {count, plural, one {# person committed} other {# people committed}}
pledge-feedback-question: What did you think about this pledge?
pledge-feedback-text-prompt: Any specific thoughts or suggestions about this pledge?
pledge-feedback-thanks-message: Your feedback helps us improve our pledges and make them more effective.
pledge-confirm-title: You're almost there! Please confirm your commitment.
pledge-confirm-description: By committing, you're promising to take this action and help build a more sustainable community. Every commitment counts toward our shared climate goals.
pledge-success-title: You're in! Want to invite others?
pledge-success-message: Thank you for joining the community in taking climate action!
pledge-success-share-label: Share this pledge with your community
pledge-form-zip-code-help: Help us understand which neighborhoods are taking action. Your ZIP code is collected anonymously.
